name: Midnight Maulers - w/Joker1028
description:
Made with Joker1028

Game Info:

You are an explorer in a forest in the middle of the night, only to be approached by various monsters.  However, since its midnight you can hardly see a thing! Use your tools and wits to survive this mess - if its even possible...

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Press Q to equip your flashlight to be able to look around for enemies, use your mouse cursor to look around

Press E to equip your gun to blast down the approaching monsters, use your mouse to aim and left click to shoot

Or, you can press the buttons on the top right to swap between the tools

Note: There is a 1 second cooldown between switching

Entry for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Have Fun!
